recipes.title: Creamy Garlic Tuscan Chicken
recipes.description: Tender chicken breasts in a creamy garlic Parmesan sauce with sun-dried tomatoes and spinach.
instructions: Season the chicken with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the chicken for 4-5 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, saut√© garlic for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in the cream and chicken broth, then stir in Parmesan, sun-dried tomatoes, and Italian seasoning. Simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Add spinach and let it wilt.
Return the chicken to the pan and simmer for another 2-3 minutes until heated through and coated with sauce.
